# Using ANOVA

- Limitations of $t$-tests
  - Can only compare two populations
  - $H_0$: $\mu_1 - \mu_2 = 0$
- ANOVA is a tool for the general case
  - Comparing any number of populations
  - $H_0$: $\mu_1 = \mu_2 = \mu_3 = \dots = \mu_n$
